metadata.Title: CVE-2009-4193 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Merkaartor 0.14 allows local users to append data to arbitrary files via a symlink attack on the /tmp/merkaartor.log temporary file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2009-4193` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

merkaartor - 0.14+svnfixes20090912-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: merkaartor package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.14+svnfixes20090912-2').
